bioghist.p: Joseph R. T. Coates was a Captain of the Pennsylvania Volunteers in the Civil War. Coates lived in Chester, Pennsylvania, and served as Chester's mayor from 1887 to 1893.

scopecontent.p: This a receipt book (1859-1865) of Joseph Coates. The volume includes receipts for rent, insurance, advertising for professional services, and household goods. Of particular interest is an 1864 receipt for $9850 as partial payment to Coates for his work "recruiting in the Rebel States"; There is a letter inserted in the volume from the Delaware County Historical Society requesting a copy of the address Coates delivered at a meeting there in 1918.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
